channel.title: My "nonwild" wont go any further down the page
channel.description:
hi guys, I started adding nonwild coords they work fine as stated:
[code]if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3156 && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374 && absY <=3514 )||(absX >=2759 && absX <=2761 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >=2762 && absX <=2767 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 )||(absX >=2768 && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >= 2500 && absX <= 2516 && absY >= 4727 && absY <= 4727) ||(absX >= 2501 && absX <= 2514 && absY >= 4728 && absY <= 4728) ||(absX >= 2509 && absX <= 2509 && absY >= 4729 && absY <= 4729) ||(absX >= 2499 && absX <= 2517 && absY >= 4725 && absY <= 4726 ) ||(absX >=3135 && absX <=3144 && absY >=3542 && absY <=3548 )|| [/code]
but if I add a new coord it goes like this:
[code]if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3156 && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374 && absY <=3514 )||(absX >=2759 && absX <=2761 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >=2762 && absX <=2767 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 )||(absX >=2768 && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >= 2500 && absX <= 2516 && absY >= 4727 && absY <= 4727) ||(absX >= 2501 && absX <= 2514 && absY >= 4728 && absY <= 4728) ||(absX >= 2509 && absX <= 2509 && absY >= 4729 && absY <= 4729) ||(absX >= 2499 && absX <= 2517 && absY >= 4725 && absY <= 4726 ) ||(absX >=3135 && absX <=3144 && absY >=3542 && absY <=3548 )|| if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || //it carries on here on a notepad doc. the compiler doesnt like it? [/code]
then the compiler messes up.
so how can i make it so it goes longer?
Many Thanks James.

item.title: My "nonwild" wont go any further down the page
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

In this code -

if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3156 && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374 && absY <=3514 )||(absX >=2759 && absX <=2761 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >=2762 && absX <=2767 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 )||(absX >=2768 && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >= 2500 && absX <= 2516 && absY >= 4727 && absY <= 4727) ||(absX >= 2501 && absX <= 2514 && absY >= 4728 && absY <= 4728) ||(absX >= 2509 && absX <= 2509 && absY >= 4729 && absY <= 4729) ||(absX >= 2499 && absX <= 2517 && absY >= 4725 && absY <= 4726 ) ||(absX >=3135 && absX <=3144 && absY >=3542 && absY <=3548 )|| if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || //it carries on here on a notepad doc. the compiler doesnt like it?

Look at the last bit where you have

if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||

It’s only meant to have 1 bracket so change it to -

if(absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||

AND since the first bit has 2 brackets, you have to add another bracket to the last bit

So your final coord will look like -

if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >=3156  && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374  && absY <=3514 )|| (absX >=2759  && absX <=2761 && absY >=2764  && absY <=2772 ) || (absX >=2762  && absX <=2767 && absY >=2764  && absY <=2766 ) || (absX >=2768  && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764  && absY <=2772 ) || (absX >= 2500 && absX <= 2516 && absY >= 4727 && absY <= 4727) || (absX >= 2501 && absX <= 2514 && absY >= 4728 && absY <= 4728) || (absX >= 2509 && absX <= 2509 && absY >= 4729 && absY <= 4729) || (absX >= 2499 && absX <= 2517 && absY >= 4725 && absY <= 4726 ) || (absX >=3135 && absX <=3144 && absY >=3542  && absY <=3548 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ))

Oh, I didn’t notice that you added too many if(( statements in it. You only need 1 ‘if’ statement, and it’s in the first bit.

Some servers have it like this -

if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >=3156 && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374 && absY <=3514 )|| (absX >=2759 && absX <=2761 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 ) || (absX >=2762 && absX <=2767 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 ) || (absX >=2768 && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 ) || (absX >= 2500 && absX <= 2516 && absY >= 4727 && absY <= 4727) || (absX >= 2501 && absX <= 2514 && absY >= 4728 && absY <= 4728) || (absX >= 2509 && absX <= 2509 && absY >= 4729 && absY <= 4729) || (absX >= 2499 && absX <= 2517 && absY >= 4725 && absY <= 4726 ) || (absX >=3135 && absX <=3144 && absY >=3542 && absY <=3548 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) heightLevel = 0)

This ^ doesn’t matter because you have another brackt after the height level line which matches the number of ‘(’ with ‘)’.

Read full topic

 || (absX >= 2759 && absX <= 2761 && absY >= 2764 && absY <= 2772)
 || (absX >= 2762 && absX <= 2767 && absY >= 2764 && absY <= 2766)

 || (absX >= 2500 && absX <= 2516 && absY >= 4727 && absY <= 4727)
 || (absX >= 2501 && absX <= 2514 && absY >= 4728 && absY <= 4728)

 ||

Organise it.

if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3156  && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374  && absY <=3514 )||(absX >=2759  && absX <=2761 && absY >=2764  && absY <=2772 )||(absX >=2762  && absX <=2767 && absY >=2764  && absY <=2766 )||(absX >=2768  && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764  && absY <=2772 )||(absX >= 2500 && absX <= 2516 && absY >= 4727 && absY <= 4727) ||(absX >= 2501 && absX <= 2514 && absY >= 4728 && absY <= 4728) ||(absX >= 2509 && absX <= 2509 && absY >= 4729 && absY <= 4729) ||(absX >= 2499 && absX <= 2517 && absY >= 4725 && absY <= 4726 ) ||(absX >=3135 && absX <=3144 && absY >=3542  && absY <=3548 )||

but if I add a new coord it goes like this:

if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3156 && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374 && absY <=3514 )||(absX >=2759 && absX <=2761 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >=2762 && absX <=2767 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 )||(absX >=2768 && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >= 2500 && absX <= 2516 && absY >= 4727 && absY <= 4727) ||(absX >= 2501 && absX <= 2514 && absY >= 4728 && absY <= 4728) ||(absX >= 2509 && absX <= 2509 && absY >= 4729 && absY <= 4729) ||(absX >= 2499 && absX <= 2517 && absY >= 4725 && absY <= 4726 ) ||(absX >=3135 && absX <=3144 && absY >=3542 && absY <=3548 )|| if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || //it carries on here on a notepad doc. the compiler doesnt like it?
